overview: She used to be a wild girl until she met him, the "Perfect Catch".  He was successful and Christian, what more would a woman want?  She doesn't know.  She is unhappy.  Unfulfilled.  The only person she can turn to is a friend who works at a homeless shelter.  Then everything gets turns on its head when the shocking truth is realized.  How will she handle it and will she keep her Vow of Passion.
title: Vow of Passion
